steps.title: Get a sheet of any paper you want and a pencil/pen.
steps.content: Get a sheet of any paper you want and a pencil/pen.

steps.title: Draw an egg shape.
steps.content: Draw an egg shape. In other words, draw an oval that is thinner at the top of than at the bottom.

steps.title: Make leafy shapes at top of oval to signal where the pineapple fruit and stem/leaves connect.
steps.content: Make leafy shapes at top of oval to signal where the pineapple fruit and stem/leaves connect.

steps.title: Draw a jagged stem coming up from the leafy shapes on the pineapple.
steps.content: Draw a jagged stem coming up from the leafy shapes on the pineapple. Add leaves to it if wanted.

steps.title: Draw diagonal going lines down the fruit.
steps.content: Draw diagonal going lines down the fruit. Make them evenly spaced apart.

steps.title: Draw diagonal going lines criss-crossing the other lines on the fruit.
steps.content: Draw diagonal going lines criss-crossing the other lines on the fruit. This should make little diamond shapes.

steps.title: Add small dots to the center of each diamond to represent the spikes on the fruit.
steps.content: Add small dots to the center of each diamond to represent the spikes on the fruit.

steps.title: If wanted, add background and/or setting.
steps.content: If wanted, add background and/or setting.
